backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for the Valentine app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component toggling between the Valentine prompt and success meme with decorative background.
frontend/src/components/SuccessMeme.tsx: Success screen showing a themed meme and animated hearts after the user selects Yes.
Main prompt UI with a fixed Yes button and evasive No button driven by a custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNoButton.ts: Logic for generating safe random positions for the evasive No button on hover/touch.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state using Dfinity AuthClient, including loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder exporting nothing, indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom romantic-themed color variables, fonts, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the romantic theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and current state for a romantic Valentine web page.
